verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses אֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> unto the priests בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> of Aaron וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about לְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> for the dead לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יִטַּמָּ֖א <WH2930> unto them There shall none be defiled בְּעַמָּֽיו׃ <WH5971> among his people

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> for לִשְׁאֵר֔וֹ <WH7607> But for his kin הַקָּרֹ֖ב <WH7138> that is near אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to him לְאִמּ֣וֹ <WH517> unto him [that is] for his mother וּלְאָבִ֔יו <WH1> and for his father וְלִבְנ֥וֹ <WH1121> and for his son וּלְבִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> and for his daughter וּלְאָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> and for his brother

וְלַאֲחֹת֤וֹ <WH269> And for his sister הַבְּתוּלָה֙ <WH1330> a virgin הַקְּרוֹבָ֣ה <WH7138> that is nigh אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no הָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> has לְאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> unto him which hath had no husband לָ֖הּ יִטַּמָּֽא׃ <WH2930> for her may he be defiled
לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יִטַּמָּ֖א <WH2930> [But] he shall not defile בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> himself [being] a chief man בְּעַמָּ֑יו <WH5971> among his people לְהֵ֖חַלּֽוֹ׃ <WH2490> to profane

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor [יִקְרְחָה כ] (יִקְרְח֤וּ <WH7139> make bald ק) קָרְחָה֙ <WH7144> baldness בְּרֹאשָׁ֔ם <WH7218> upon their head וּפְאַ֥ת <WH6285> the corner זְקָנָ֖ם <WH2206> of their beard לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יְגַלֵּ֑חוּ <WH1548> neither shall they shave off וּבִ֨בְשָׂרָ֔ם <WH1320> in their flesh לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִשְׂרְט֖וּ <WH8295> nor make שָׂרָֽטֶת׃ <WH8296> any cuttings

קְדֹשִׁ֤ים <WH6918> therefore they shall be holy יִהְיוּ֙ <WH1961> become לֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> unto their God וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not יְחַלְּל֔וּ <WH2490> and not profane שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> the name אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> of their God כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> אִשֵּׁ֨י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֶ֧חֶם <WH3899> [and] the bread אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֛ם <WH430> of their God הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they מַקְרִיבִ֖ם <WH7126> they do offer וְהָ֥יוּ <WH1961> become קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> They shall be holy

אִשָּׁ֨ה <WH802> a wife זֹנָ֤ה <WH2181> [that is] a whore וַחֲלָלָה֙ <WH2491> or profane לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִקָּ֔חוּ <WH3947> They shall not take וְאִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> a woman גְּרוּשָׁ֥ה <WH1644> put away מֵאִישָׁ֖הּ <WH376> from her husband לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִקָּ֑חוּ <WH3947> neither shall they take כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָדֹ֥שׁ <WH6918> for he [is] holy ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לֵאלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> unto his God

וְקִדַּשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH6942> Thou shalt sanctify כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> the bread אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> of thy God ה֣וּא <WH1931> he מַקְרִ֑יב <WH7126> him therefore for he offereth קָדֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> he shall be holy יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּ֔ךְ כִּ֣י <WH3588> for קָד֔וֹשׁ <WH6918> you [am] holy אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto thee for I the LORD מְקַדִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH6942> which sanctify

וּבַת֙ <WH1323> And the daughter אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> of any כֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> priest כִּ֥י <WH3588> if תֵחֵ֖ל <WH2490> if she profane לִזְנ֑וֹת <WH2181> herself by playing the whore אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <WH1> her father הִ֣יא <WH1931> she מְחַלֶּ֔לֶת <WH2490> she profaneth בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> with fire תִּשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <WH8313> she shall be burnt ס

וְהַכֹּהֵן֩ <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֨וֹל <WH1419> And [he that is] the high מֵאֶחָ֜יו <WH251> among his brethren אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose יוּצַ֥ק <WH3332> was poured עַל־ <WH5921> and רֹאשׁ֣וֹ ׀ <WH7218> upon whose head שֶׁ֤מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָה֙ <WH4888> the anointing וּמִלֵּ֣א <WH4390> accomplish אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> able לִלְבֹּ֖שׁ <WH3847> to put אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּגָדִ֑ים <WH899> on the garments אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁוֹ֙ <WH7218> his head לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִפְרָ֔ע <WH6544> shall not uncover וּבְגָדָ֖יו <WH899> his clothes לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִפְרֹֽם׃ <WH6533> nor rend

וְעַ֛ל <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> any נַפְשֹׁ֥ת <WH5315> body מֵ֖ת <WH4191> to any dead לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יָבֹ֑א <WH935> Neither shall he go in לְאָבִ֥יו <WH1> himself for his father וּלְאִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> or for his mother לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִטַּמָּֽא׃ <WH2930> nor defile

וּמִן־ <WH4480> out הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <WH4720> of the sanctuary לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יֵצֵ֔א <WH3318> Neither shall he go out וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יְחַלֵּ֔ל <WH2490> nor profane אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִקְדַּ֣שׁ <WH4720> the sanctuary אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> of his God כִּ֡י <WH3588> for נֵ֠זֶר <WH5145> for the crown שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil מִשְׁחַ֧ת <WH4888> of the anointing אֱלֹהָ֛יו <WH430> of his God עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [is] upon him I [am] the LORD
וְה֕וּא <WH1931> he אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> a wife בִבְתוּלֶ֖יהָ <WH1331> in her virginity יִקָּֽח׃ <WH3947> And he shall take

אַלְמָנָ֤ה <WH490> A widow וּגְרוּשָׁה֙ <WH1644> or a divorced woman וַחֲלָלָ֣ה <WH2491> or profane זֹנָ֔ה <WH2181> [or] an harlot אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these לֹ֣א <WH3808> may not יִקָּ֑ח <WH3947> these shall he not take כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo בְּתוּלָ֥ה <WH1330> a virgin מֵעַמָּ֖יו <WH5971> of his own people יִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> but he shall take אִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> he will not יְחַלֵּ֥ל <WH2490> Neither shall he profane זַרְע֖וֹ <WH2233> his seed בְּעַמָּ֑יו <WH5971> among his people כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God מְקַדְּשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6942> do sanctify פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> Speak אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> unto Aaron לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Whosoever מִֽזַּרְעֲךָ֞ <WH2233> [he be] of thy seed לְדֹרֹתָ֗ם <WH1755> in their generations אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> has בוֹ֙ מ֔וּם <WH3971> that hath [any] blemish לֹ֣א <WH3808> No יִקְרַ֔ב <WH7126> let him not approach לְהַקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> to offer לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> the bread אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> of his God

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> all manner אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> For whatsoever man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בּ֥וֹ מ֖וּם <WH3971> [he be] that hath a blemish לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִקְרָ֑ב <WH7126> he shall not approach אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> man עִוֵּר֙ <WH5787> a blind א֣וֹ <WH176> or פִסֵּ֔חַ <WH6455> or a lame א֥וֹ <WH176> or חָרֻ֖ם <WH2763> or he that hath a flat nose א֥וֹ <WH176> or שָׂרֽוּעַ׃ <WH8311> or any thing superfluous
א֣וֹ <WH176> or אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> Or a man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> has ב֖וֹ שֶׁ֣בֶר <WH7667> A broken רָ֑גֶל <WH7272> foot א֖וֹ <WH176> or שֶׁ֥בֶר <WH7667> broken יָֽד׃ <WH3027> hand

אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or גִבֵּ֣ן <WH1384> Or crookbackt אוֹ־ <WH176> or דַ֔ק <WH1851> or a dwarf א֖וֹ <WH176> or תְּבַלֻּ֣ל <WH8400> or that hath a blemish בְּעֵינ֑וֹ <WH5869> in his eye א֤וֹ <WH176> or גָרָב֙ <WH1618> or be scurvy א֣וֹ <WH176> or יַלֶּ֔פֶת <WH3217> or scabbed א֖וֹ <WH176> or מְר֥וֹחַ <WH4790> broken אָֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH810> or hath his stones

כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אִ֞ישׁ <WH376> No man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בּ֣וֹ מ֗וּם <WH3971> that hath a blemish מִזֶּ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> of the seed אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִגַּ֔שׁ <WH5066> shall come nigh לְהַקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> to offer אֶת־ <WH853> אִשֵּׁ֣י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD מ֣וּם <WH3971> he hath a blemish בּ֔וֹ אֵ֚ת <WH853> לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> the bread אֱלֹהָ֔יו <WH430> of his God לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִגַּ֖שׁ <WH5066> he shall not come nigh לְהַקְרִֽיב׃ <WH7126> to offer

לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> the bread אֱלֹהָ֔יו <WH430> of his God מִקָּדְשֵׁ֖י <WH6944> [both] of the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> holy וּמִן־ <WH4480> and of הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> and of the holy יֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> He shall eat

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> only אֶל־ <WH413> to הַפָּרֹ֜כֶת <WH6532> unto the vail לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יָבֹ֗א <WH935> Only he shall not go in וְאֶל־ <WH413> about הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <WH4196> unto the altar לֹ֥א <WH3808> or יִגַּ֖שׁ <WH5066> nor come nigh כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מ֣וּם <WH3971> because he hath a blemish בּ֑וֹ וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> he will not יְחַלֵּל֙ <WH2490> that he profane אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְדָּשַׁ֔י <WH4720> not my sanctuaries כִּ֛י <WH3588> because אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for I the LORD מְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <WH6942> do sanctify

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> told מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> [it] unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> and to his sons וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> and unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ
